name: Yummy Breakfast!
description:
A normal cute game HELP about a young girl who HELP ME makes herself a healthy breakfast. (Contains imagery and themes not suitable for young audiences.)

Graphics by White Screw Shop, First Seed Material, and Wato, and music and sound by Vita-Chi Sozaikan,  TAM Music Factory,  Maou Damashii,  Karugamo BGM, and  White Music Hall.
